name: AVQueuePlayer
desc: An object that plays a sequence of player items.

items.name: init(items: [AVPlayerItem])
items.desc: Creates an object that plays a queue of items.

items.name: func items() -> [AVPlayerItem]
items.desc: Returns an array of the currently enqueued items.

items.name: func advanceToNextItem()
items.desc: Ends playback of the current item and starts playback of the next item in the player’s queue.

items.name: func canInsert(AVPlayerItem, after: AVPlayerItem?) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether you can insert a player item into the player’s queue.

items.name: func insert(AVPlayerItem, after: AVPlayerItem?)
items.desc: Inserts a player item after another player item in the queue.

items.name: func remove(AVPlayerItem)
items.desc: Removes a given player item from the queue.

items.name: func removeAllItems()
items.desc: Removes all player items from the queue.
